name: Arivu
description: '''Arivarasu Kalainesan''', more commonly known as '''Arivu''', is an Indian rapper, singer, songwriter and composer. He is best known for his Tamil independent singles, including "{{lang|ta|[[Enjoy Enjaami]]}}",  and for his work on film numbers like "Vaathi Raid" from ''[[Master (2021 film)|Master]]'' (2021), "Single Pasanga" from {{lang|ta|[[Natpe Thunai]]}} (2019), "{{lang|ta|[[Neeye Oli]]}}" from {{lang|ta|[[Sarpatta Parambarai]]}} (2021), "Golden Sparrow" from ''[[Nilavuku En Mel Ennadi Kobam]]'' and "[[Thalapathy Kacheri]]" from ''[[Jana Nayagan]]'' (2026).
